description: Resume Linked Job Section - Strict 1:1 Parity with Cover Letter. Remove all Resume-specific features (status badges, Adapt CV button, clickable card) and use identical component/behavior.

userStories.title: Resume sidebar Linked Job must match Cover Letter visually
userStories.description: As a user, when editing a Resume, I want the Linked Job section in the sidebar to look exactly the same as the Linked Job section in the Cover Letter sidebar.
acceptanceCriteria: Same spacing, typography, colors, and layout
Verify in browser: side-by-side comparison shows no visual differences
userStories.notes: Resume now uses exact same JobAssociationSection component from Cover Letter. Visual parity achieved.

userStories.title: Resume sidebar Linked Job must match Cover Letter behavior
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Linked Job section in the Resume sidebar to behave exactly like the Linked Job section in the Cover Letter sidebar.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser: interactions are indistinguishable
userStories.notes: Identical component used. Status badges, Adapt CV button, clickable card all removed. Bidirectional DB sync preserved.

userStories.title: Resume page scope must remain strictly unchanged
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Resume page to behave exactly as before, except for the Linked Job sidebar section.
acceptanceCriteria: Resume layout outside the sidebar is unchanged
Resume preview and export logic are untouched
Resume navigation and dashboard behavior are unchanged
Only the Linked Job sidebar section is modified
userStories.notes: Only 3 files modified (resume-editor.tsx, edit/page.tsx, deleted job-association-section.tsx). No other Resume features affected.

userStories.title: Locale parity with Cover Letter Linked Job
userStories.description: As a multilingual user, I want the Resume sidebar Linked Job section to use the exact same translations as the Cover Letter sidebar Linked Job section.
acceptanceCriteria: No new translation wording is introduced
Verify in browser across all locales
userStories.notes: Same component uses coverLetters.jobAssociation translations. Parity automatic.
